When i use inline hyperlinks entire the text blocks with 'text-align="justify"',
the link active area appear displaced from the link text. 
It seems, that the coordinates of active area are calculated without the 
consideration of the justification algorithm. (As if the default alignment type 
was used).

Thanks.
Fixed for 0.18.1. See examples/fo/newlinktest.fo for a test case that works now.
